ComicInfo.Summary:
While she continues to be hunted, Leslie finally meets Carol. But this meeting leads to new questions and doubts in a spiral of uncertainties, pain, and bad memories. Will Leslie be able to get up again? As more details of the grim—and unsettlingly familiar—scenario created by MIRKA ANDOLFO emerge, Leslie’s tale of emancipation and self-discovery reaches a turning point.
